item.title: GRUNDIG GWN410460CW 10 kg 1400 Spin Washing Machine - White - WH
item.description: Product features Capacity: 10 kg Spin speed: 1400 rpm Quick wash time: 14 minutes for 2 kg Energy rating: A+++ Top features:- Efficient performance to help you save money on your bills- Large 10 kg capacity to wash the whole family's laundry- Anti-allergy program to care for those with sensitive skin- Touch control LCD display to easily choose your settingsEfficient performanceThe Grundig GWN410460CW 10 kg 1400 Spin Washing Machine delivers an efficient performance, helping you to save money on your household bills whilst also being kinder to the environment. The Aqua Perfect 40°/40' program washes a full load of laundry at 40°C in just 40 minutes - ideal for an economical wash that can deal with most loads.A SenseWash program uses sensors to detect the size and fabric type of each load, automatically choosing the best settings to suit your needs.Large 10 kg capacityWhen you have a busy household, it can be a hassle trying to keep on top of the laundry as it piles up. The GWN410460CW has a large 10 kg capacity so that you can get more clothes washed at once to save you time. That's enough space for 50 shirts or even a king size duvet, making it ideal for large families.Anti-allergy programIf you or somebody in your family suffers from allergies, it's important to know that your clothes will emerge from each wash completely clean. The GWN410460CW's Anti-allergy program is endorsed by Allergy UK, eliminating cat and dog allergens, bacteria, dust mites and fungi. Whether you have a young baby in the family or somebody who suffers from asthma, the Anti-allergy program is a helpful addition to your laundry options.You can also use the GentleCare program to protect your more delicate clothes, so you won't have to worry about discolouration or damage to your favourite top.Touch control LCD displayIt's easy to control the GWN410460CW with the touch controls of the LCD display. Whatever settings you choose to use, you'll have complete control at your fingertips.For peace of mind, the appliance also features a child safety lock to prevent little fingers from accidentally switching between settings and programs.

item.description: Boasting a smart and professional stainless steel finish, the Samsung RL4362RBASL/EU Fridge Freezer makes it easy to keep all of the family's fresh and frozen food safely stored.Plenty of spaceWith a total of 432 litres of storage space, you'll be able to comfortably pack away the weekly shop in this attractive modern appliance.The refrigerator offers 300 litres of room and is fitted with three safety glass shelves, a further five door balconies and two salad crispers, making it simple to stack away all your food and produce.A Multi-Flow system uses vents on every level of the fridge to ensure an even temperature is maintained throughout, even after the door has been opened. By keeping all sections cool simultaneously, your food will remain fresher for longer.Refresh yourselfLetting you enjoy a refreshingly cool drink of water on demand, a chilled water dispenser is available. Non-plumbed, you simply need to make sure the internal reservoir is kept topped up and you'll be able to benefit from a chilled drink whenever you're thirsty.The freezer compartment providers a four-star cooling environment for your frozen items and is made up of four clear fronted drawers.In addition, a twist ice cube tray makes it simple to produce and store a supply of ice cubes - perfect for chilling your favourite beverages.Clever technologyBoth compartments in the RL4362RBASL feature frost free technology, meaning the chore of performing a manual defrost can be consigned to the past.This appliance also makes use of a smart sensor system and works by monitoring the temperature in your kitchen, the humidity level in the fridge and even your usage patterns. By using this data, the RL4362RBASL-EU is able to make appropriate adjustments and ensure you food is always kept in the optimal environment to keep it cool and fresh.With a 5 year guarantee and an A+ energy efficiency rating, the Samsung RL4362RBASL/EU Fridge Freezer is both an effective and smart fridge freezer that is ideal for any family home.

item.title: BEKO Pro Select CFMD7852X 50/50 Fridge Freezer - Stainless Steel
item.description: Product features185 x 74 x 77 cm (H x W x D)Fridge: 264 litres / Freezer: 198 litresNo need to defrost with frost free technologyWater dispenser (no plumbing required)Convertible fridge &amp; freezer zone for extra storageWith the exclusive Beko CFMD7852X Fridge Freezer you'll enjoy large and versatile storage for all kinds of food, with high-performance features and a stylish stainless steel finish.Our experts love the Multi-Zone feature that brings unrivalled flexibility to your kitchen, ideal for when you need extra cooling or freezer space. By simply pressing a button on the digital display, the top drawer can be used as either a fridge, freezer, chiller or wine cooler. Complete flexibility, based on your storage needs. Food, glorious foodThere are three individual compartments for you to store different food types in the best-possible conditions.Keep fresh groceries in the 264-litre fridge compartment, with three safety glass shelves to support all your containers and other goods. These are adjustable to accommodate items of different heights – plus there are three door compartments for bottles, jars and more. Store eggs safely in the egg rack, while a wine rack keeps your whites, rosés and champagnes neat and perfectly chilled.The middle drawer is a multi-zone compartment which can be activated with the touch of a button on the control panel. It can act as either a fridge or freezer, making it the ideal solution when you need more space.Store more frozen food in the CFMD7852X with its 198-litre freezer compartment. This houses two drawers to accommodate all your meat, desserts, vegetables and more. There's an ice cube tray to help you keep those drinks chilled.Cooler functions for your convenienceThe Beko CFMD7852X Fridge Freezer features the sophisticated Active Fresh Blue Light, which allows photosynthesis to continue in the fridge so that fruit and vegetables stay tastier and fresher for longer.Its NeoFrost technology employs twin cooling fans and evaporators to maintain high fridge humidity levels for improved fruit and vegetable freshness. Odour transfer between the fridge and freezer is also prevented with the odour filter.Harmful bacteria in the fridge are neutralised by the ioniser, which keeps the air clean for prolonged food storage.Super chilling – with no frostYou'll be able to respectively chill and freeze new groceries faster and more effectively with the Beko CFMD7852X, which incorporates both fast chill and fast freeze functions. These help protect items you already have stored in the appliance when you're loading in from a shopping trip, and they lock in the goodness for fresher eating.Auto-defrost and frost-free technology in the fridge and freezer prevent the build-up of ice crystals so that you won't have to endure the hassle and mess of manually defrosting the fridge again.Take control in the kitchenYou'll be able to enjoy a lovely chilled glass of water when you want it thanks to the non-plumbed water dispenser - just top up the internal tank and allow the fridge to dispense a cold beverage when you really need one.Smoothly control your Beko CFMD7852X Fridge Freezer using its advanced electronic touch controls and LED display. You won't have to open the doors to make adjustments, saving time and energy. The display keeps you informed about temperature information, the fast freeze and quick cool functions, and whether holiday mode is operating.If you accidentally leave the fridge or freezer door open, an audible warning will sound to alert you - another great energy-saving, food-preserving feature.The Beko CFMD7852X Fridge Freezer has the space and convenience features to give you options when it comes to storing your food.

Stylish, versatile and a great all-rounder, it gives you a fan oven and grill rolled into one, and with nine functions overall, this oven helps to make cooking simple and stress-free.A 58L capacity ensures there aren’t many dishes that it couldn’t handle, taking everything from your day-to-day tasks to roasting a turkey at Christmas into its stride. The door is triple glazed, helping to keep the heat inside to save energy while also keeping the outside of the door cooler and therefore safer as you cook. item.title: New World 444444190 Built-in Combination Microwave & Steam Oven - Black
item.description: The detailsThis combination microwave and steam oven is perfect for foodies and those who need some extra cooking space in the kitchen as it has a spacious 34L capacity, larger than your standard microwave. This built-in appliance offers a variety of cooking methods, so you can really mix it up and try out new recipes which may have been a challenge in the past.Cooking with steam, this oven comes in ideal for recipes where moisture is key, such as risotto, rice, cous cous, vegetables and fish dishes. Your recipes won’t dry out, like they often can with a traditional oven, plus steam cooking offers a much healthier low fat way to cook, without destroying nutrients. It’s also a great way to warm up leftovers without losing any moisture, so you’re food will taste as good as the day you made it.That’s not all, this oven can also be used as a convection oven, which cooks food faster than a traditional oven as it blows hot air to surround food for a delicious and even cook. Cooking with convection gives you much better browning results too, so when it comes to roasting meats and vegetables you’ll get a mouth-watering crisp and roasted exterior with a moist interior.There’s numerous functions to choose from with this oven, 11 in fact, so there’s definitely something to suit every dish. You can use it as a standard microwave or a grill, and there’s functions which combine settings for impressive results. When putting it to use as a microwave it uses flatbed technology, so there’s no fiddly or restricting turn table required. You’ll get an even cook no matter what shape cookware you use and wherever you position the dish.

item.title: HOTPOINT HUD61X S 60cm Dual Fuel Cooker - Stainless Steel
item.description: The sleek stainless steel Hotpoint HUD61X S FSD Dual Fuel Cooker offers you a great oven, grill and hobs that will be a delight to cook on and a focal point in your kitchen.Combo cookingDelivering maximum convenience and usability, the HUD61X FSD has a fan oven and a conventional oven - enough space for even the most ambitious cook. The 65-litre main oven has a fan to distribute heat and the second, 35-litre oven also doubles as a spacious variable grill.As well as that, there are 4 effective gas burners whose pan supports which come with FSD flame supervision for safety and an attractive glass hob lid.Simple cleaningStylish bar handles make getting into your cooker easy, and the HUD61X has a large viewing window and lighting inside the oven. You're sure to save yourself time and effort with this cooker's catalytic cleaning, which uses the heat of the oven to break down grease and fat inside the oven. There's also a cool-touch door to keep you and your family safe.With an LED programmable timer and a top level A/A rating for energy efficiency, the Hotpoint HUD61X FSD Dual Fuel Cooker ticks all the boxes for a modern dual fuel cooker.Hotpoint and Jamie OliverExpress yourself in the kitchen. Hotpoint and Jamie Oliver have teamed up to deliver innovative appliances that make cooking simple for any passionate baker, roast aficionado or comfort-style cook. Love your food and eat better whether you're entertaining or making everyday meals.

item.title: HOTPOINT ULTIMA S-LINE RG 864 S WASHER DRYER - WHITE
item.description: Experience an all-round appliance that works in harmony with your day-to-day life. The Ultima S-Line Washer Dryer in white (RG 864 S UK) brings together 16 intuitive features with a 9kg drum and clever sensor and stain removal technology to accommodate every wash and tumble drying requirement. Remove stains at lower temperaturesIncorporating Hotpoint’s innovative Direct Injection Technology, remove more than 100 stains at 20° thanks to superior water and detergent premix injected directly into the wash. By infusing the detergent and water before it reaches your laundry, cleaning enzymes are activated faster, penetrating fibres deeper and delivering up to 60% more cleaning power, even at low temperatures.Remedying those emergency laundry moments, Ready to Wear provides an effective wash and dry cycle in just 45 minutes to help get your day back on track, whilst the Fast Wash cycle offers another option to quickly get through loads. Perfect for allergy sufferersFor those who suffer from sensitivity to pollen, dust and pet dander, the Ultima S-Line includes an Anti-Allergy wash and rinse cycle, so effective it removes 99.9% of major allergens and has been awarded the Allergy UK Seal of Approval. Providing extra peace of mind, Steam Technology uses natural cleaning power at the end of the cycle to give an extra level of deep, intensive cleaning to your laundry making it ideal for pet blankets and towels. Gentle care for your woollensComplementing its exceptional washing options, the Ultima S-Line provides variable cycles for the same great level of considerate tumble drying. With a dedicated spin for every fabric type, carrying the Woolmark Platinum badge, you can tumble with confidence that your knits will receive extra special care to keep their fibres protected and full of bounce. Using gentle rotations, woollens face less friction and stress, helping them retain shape and snugness. Super silentDelivering variable spin speeds of up to 1400rpm, the Super Silent Motor also prevents your laundry duties from disturbing family moments as special sound insulating panels and an advanced brushless motor reduces noise levels dramatically. Capable of tackling every challenge your household has to offer, with multiple programs including Super Wash, Fast Wash, Eco and Delicate cycles, the Ultima S-Line is designed for every eventuality whether it’s renewing brightness in school shirts, lifting stubborn marks out of jeans or quickly washing the gym kit ready for another work-out. Freeing your time, the Ultima S-Line Washer Dryer (RG 864 S UK) has all the technology you need, while its sleek, eye-catching design will fit seamlessly into every kitchen and utility room.MAIN SPECIFICATIONWashing capacity (kg): 8Drying capacity (kg): 6Spin Speed (rpm): 1400

item.title: Beko MCB25433BG Built-In Microwave with Grill - Black
item.description: Revitalise your kitchen with this versatile microwave with grill. The built-in Beko MCB25433BG oven has a useful range of auto-functions to make your home cooking as simple as pressing a button. With easy-to-use controls and sleek black styling, this appliance is ideal for families – or anyone – leading a busy life.Easy to useAutomatic modes put you in complete control of the microwave’s 1000W power and the 900W grill. With a generous 25L capacity, it has eight automatic modes, a dedicated reheat button to warm up last night’s pizza and a defrost setting that just requires you to input the weight of the food.Extra featuresThe oven has five microwave power levels and its 1000W grill means you can brown and finish dishes with ease. A stainless steel cavity means easy cleaning and an electronic child lock will give peace of mind in family homes.

item.title: Beko MGB25332BG Built In Microwave With Grill - Black / Stainless Steel
item.description: Key Features25 litre capacity - great for small households900 Watt power output – cooks food rapidly and evenlyChoose from 5 power levelsAutomatic programmes take the guesswork out of cookingDimensions (cm) H38.8 x W59.5 x D39.2 - Learn moreProduct OverviewWhip up your favourite meals in a flash with this built-in microwave from Beko. As it has a 25 litre capacity, it’s an ideal choice for smaller households. It also has a 900 Watt power output, so you’ll never wait long to tuck in to your tasty treats. With 5 power levels to choose from, you’ll have more cooking options at mealtimes. The handy auto-cook function gives you 8 pre-programmed recipes, so your delicious dishes will be ready at the push of a button. This model is designed to fit in an eye level cabinet.

item.title: Beko BRDF21000X Built In Double Oven - Stainless Steel - A/A Rated
item.description: Key FeaturesMain electric fan oven cooks food evenly on every shelfSecond electric oven has a handy grill settingAdjustable shelves for flexibilityGrease-proof enamel coating makes oven cleaning easyDimensions (cm) H89 x W59.4 x D56.7 – Learn moreProduct OverviewThis built-in electric double oven from Beko would be a great addition to your kitchen. The main fan oven circulates heat so food cooks evenly on every shelf, meaning you’ll always enjoy perfect pizza bases and thoroughly-cooked quiches. There’s also a second conventional oven with a useful grill setting – handy for making your morning bacon. Thanks to its fully adjustable shelves, this model gives you plenty of versatility when it comes to cooking different dishes at the same time. Both ovens have a grease-proof enamel interior as well, so it’s easy to keep everything clean. This appliance is designed to fit at eye level.

item.title: Sharp SJSX830FBK Five Door American Style Refrigerator - Black
item.description: Key FeaturesA++ Energy rating for extra savingsHuge 652 litre capacityUnique 5-door layoutDigital display and control panelLED interior lightingHumidity-controlled drawers to preserve your fruit, vegetables, meat, fish and cheese for longer

item.title: Sharp SJ-F1529E0I American Fridge Freezer - Inox
item.description: The flexible design of the Sharp SJ-F1529E0I allows you to use the entire top cavity of the fridge, and the handy storage pull out drawer in the freezer compartment is great for quickly accessing your favourite frozen food quickly.With a vast 529 net litres of storage, this refrigerator is perfect for that big family shop.Sharps' hybrid cooling system wraps cold air around the inside of the fridge, maintaining an even cold temperature and preventing food from drying out.A holiday mode allows the fridge compartment to be switched off when you are away, leaving the freezer to take care of your frozen food.Advanced Cooling SystemBy using a smart temperature control system and advanced air distribution around the fridge this system prevents your food from drying out. No more sad looking vegetables.Advanced No FrostBy using independent circulation systems for the freezer and fridge frost is prevented, as are odours from one section to the next.LED Interior LightingHarsh lighting never flattered anyone but with delicate LED lighting the food is illuminated just right for those midnight snacks meaning you can see everything your fridge has to offer.ZeroDegreeZoneCreates the optimum conditions for storing fresh meat and fish for longer.- Capacity; Total: 529 L, Fridge: 362 L, Freezer: 167 L- ZeroDegreeZone and Advanced Cooling System- Freestanding- H 185.0 x W 91.0 x D 76.3 cm

item.title: BEKO DIN16X10 Full-size Fully Integrated Dishwasher
item.description: Product features81.8 x 59.8 x 55 cm (H x W x D)Ideal for medium-sized households (14 place settings)Energy rating: A+Quick wash: 30 minutesIdeal for open plan livingTop features:- Quick programs get dishes clean in half an hour - Large interior holds several meals' worth of dishes - Half load setting saves on water and energy when not full - Make more room by shifting the upper basket upwards - SelFit adapts to your cupboard door Quick programsThe Beko DIN16X10 Full-size Fully Integrated Dishwasher can wash a full load of slightly dirty dishes in half an hour, so you've always got plates for dinner. When you've got a more difficult to clean set, the Quick&amp;Shine function can still manage it in under an hour.Large interiorAfter a big family dinner you can get all of your dishes into the Beko DIN16X10 Dishwasher in one go. With room for 14 place settings, you can fit in several meals' worth of dishes, so you don't need to run the dishwasher after every meal.Half load settingIf the kids are out and the house is quiet, you don't always create enough washing up for a full load. Rather than leaving the dishes on the side until you generate more, you can use the Half Load function to get a few things washed without spending a full load's worth of water and energy.Make more roomDon't relegate your wok to being hand washed just because it's big. The upper basket can be moved up to make more room, even when it's fully loaded. The plate supports can be folded down, so it's even easier to fit your various pans, and the cutlery basket can be slid around or taken out completely.SelFitThe hinge uses a spring mechanism to automatically adjust to the weight of your cupboard door, solving a common problem with integrated models. This means that you can open the door to any angle and it will stay there.

item.title: Amica AWC300SS Wine Cooler - Stainless Steel - A Rated
item.description: Key FeaturesHolds 19 bottles of wineTemperature range between 5 and 20 degreesBright LED light illuminates the cabinetReversible door to suit your kitchen layoutDimensions (cm) - H82.5 x W29.5 x D57Product OverviewDrink like a sommelier with this stylish stainless steel wine cooler from Amica. It can hold up to 19 bottles, so your party guests will be spoilt for choice. You can also adjust the temperature from between 5 and 20 degrees, so whether it’s Pinot Grigio or Sauvignon Blanc, you can enjoy a perfectly chilled glass to suit your palate. The interior LED light illuminates the inside, attractively displaying your bottles while making it easy to find your wine of choice. It even has a reversible door, so it will seamlessly fit the design of your kitchen.

item.title: BOSCH SMV40C30GB Full-size Integrated Dishwasher
item.description: Product features81.5 x 59.8 x 55 cm (H x W x D)Ideal for smaller households (12 place settings)Energy rating: A+Quick wash: 29 minutesTailor your appliance to suit your needs and get A+ energy rated cleaning with the Bosch SMV40C30GB Full-size Integrated Dishwasher.VarioPerfect &amp; VarioSpeedThe SMV40C30GB's VarioPerfect options let you customise each wash cycle to suit your load. Choose the Eco50 program to save energy or the VarioSpeed to get powerful cleaning in half the time.VarioBasketThere's plenty of space for all your pots, pans, plates and glasses – no matter what their size or shape. The dishwasher's two foldable racks in the top and bottom baskets provide effective space to accommodate. There's room for 12 place settings too – ideal for a quick clean up after dinner.Active WaterGet the maximum use out of every drop of water, thanks to Bosch's innovative ActiveWater technology. With faster heating times, targeted water circulation and improved pump performance, the SMV40C30GB ensures no water is wasted. Plus, combined with its A+ energy rating, you can cut down on those energy bills too.Dosage AssistMake sure your dishwasher gets the most out of its detergent – thanks to the SMV40C30GB's Dosage Assist feature you can ensure its performance is maximised. By catching the tablet once it's dropped into the cycle, Dosage Assist makes sure its effectively dissolved, giving you great results every time.Eco Silence DriveThe SMV40C30GB uses magnets instead of brushes to rotate around the motor, making the dishwasher run extra quietly. Run a cycle overnight or during your favourite TV show and you won't be disturbed.Safety lockFor extra peace of mind the SMV40C30GB features a safety lock to prevent the doors for accidently being opened – ideal for families with young children.The dishwasher's new TimeLight also indicates the program status and time remaining – so you'll never disrupt a cycle again.Engineered with intelligent storage and wash features, the Bosch SMV40C30GB Full-size Integrated Dishwasher gives you powerful, energy efficient cleaning day after day.

item.title: Matrix MFC701 54cm Wide 70/30 Integrated Upright Fridge Freezer - White
item.description: This integrated fridge freezer from Matrix has an A+ energy efficiency rating, a 70/30 split between the fridge and the freezer and is manually controlled, making it the perfect fridge freezer for those who want a fridge freezer that will save them space and money in the long run.How will this fit in my kitchen?This is a built in fridge freezer and is designed to be fitted into a tall kitchen cabinet unit with the fridge at eye-level and the freezer below. Please measure the dimensions of this integrated fridge freezer carefully to ensure it will fit in your kitchen cabinet:Dimensions: (W) 540mm x (D) 540mm x (H) 1773mmThe front feet are height adjustable, which will make it easier to secure the fridge freezer inside your kitchen cabinet. The doors are reversible with sliding fixings that are perfect for more compact kitchens because you can position the doors to swing in a direction that suits the layout of your kitchen.The FridgeThe fridge section of this integrated fridge freezer has 70% of the appliance’s space, which makes it ideal for those who like to buy more fresh than frozen. It also comes with some handy features to help to organise and optimise the space to suit your groceries:4 glass shelves (plus a half shelf)2 salad crisper drawers4 in-door balconiesEgg trayThe interior light will help you to see to all corners of the fridge, making sure you don’t forget or miss smaller items of food before they go out of date.

item.title: CDA EVP91SS Level 2 90cm Chimney Cooker Hood - Stainless Steel
item.description: The CDA EVP91SS is a 90cm wide shelf-style chimney hood finished in stainless steel with a sexy glass feature across the front.This model has 3 speeds that can be selected by svelte touch controls and dishwasher-safe metallic grease filters. There are two 20 Watt halogen lights to illuminate your hob. The powerful motor gives you an excellent extraction rate of 608 cubic metres per hour, which is ideal for kitchens up to 87 cubic metres, and an average noise level at 56 decibels.As a wall-mounted extractor the EVP91SS can be installed to re-circulate the air into the kitchen or to be ducted out. If you are choosing to re-circulate you’ll need a pack of CHA21 charcoal filters and if you’re ducting out you’ll need a ducting kit with a 150mm diameter.CDA guarantee their appliances for 5 years on the parts and 2 years on the labour. Please ensure you register your appliance to receive this.FeaturesDucted or re-circulating installation3 speeds + intensiveDishwashable aluminium grease filtersTouch controlFilter saturation warning lightClean air function15 minute timermotorEnergyEnergy rating: DLighting2 x 20 W halogen lampsExtraction And Noise RatesMax extraction rate: 608 m³/hrNoise level: 62 dB(A)FiltersNumber of grease filters: 4Number of charcoal filters (optional): 2Charcoal filter code: CHA21Ducting kit: AED61/63/64Technical SpecificationsRequired height over gas hob: 700 mmRequired height over electric hob: 600 mmPower supply required: 3 ampsOutlet diameter: 150 mmRated electrical power: 290 WPlease note: This chimney hood is designed to be fixed to a wall.

With transparent drawer fronts, you won't have to rummage around to see what you've got left.The CUL55B19 has a reversible door, so no need to worry if you want to change the layout of your kitchen.

item.title: SAMSUNG RB31FDRNDSA/EU 70/30 Fridge Freezer - Silver - WH (5)
item.description: Product features185 x 59.5 x 66.8 cm (H x W x D)Fridge: 210 litres / Freezer: 98 litresNo need to defrost with frost free technologyWater dispenser (no plumbing required)Open door alarm warns you if the door is left openTop features:- Fridge storage offers 210 litres of space - Chilling technology to keep the temperature even - No frost to help save you time and energy - A refreshing design including an integrated water dispenser Fridge storageStore your fresh food safely in the large RB31FDRNDSA/EU. The fridge offers an impressive 210 litres of space with four easy slide adjustable tempered glass shelves so that you can easily store your food. It also features an easy slide shelf. This is built on rolling hinges and pulls out, so you can efficiently organize and easily access your food items – and see exactly what you have stored in the back.There's ample space for fresh fruit, vegetables and eggs thanks to the salad crisper and egg rack, and the dairy compartment is ideal for products such as butter and cheese.Chilling bottles and cans is a breeze as this fridge freezer has a wine rack, bottle rack and a can rack.The RB31FDRNDSA/EU also offers a large frozen storage space, 98 litres in total, which is ideal for storing frozen food for your family. There are three clear-fronted drawers that make it easy to see what you have in the 4-star freezer.Chilling technologyMulti Flow Cooling vents provide rapid cooling and keep the temperature even throughout the fridge. On top of this, anti-bacterial protection helps to prevent the growth of potentially harmful bacteria.No FrostActing as a time-saver, the RB31FDRNDSA/EU 70/30 Fridge Freezer features Samsung's No Frost system. This maintains a constant temperature in every corner of the refrigerator, keeping perishable food fresh nutritious and eliminating frost and the build-up of ice. Its improved efficiency places less demand on the cooling system, increasing its durability, and avoids the need to waste power on defrosting.There's no need to worry if the power fails as this freezer can keep your food safely frozen for up to 20 hours.A refreshing designYou can enjoy a cool drink of water whenever you like as the RB31FDRNDSA/EU includes a chilled water dispenser. There is no need to plumb it in, as it includes a 4.5 litre water tank. The energy efficient top LED brilliantly illuminates the entire refrigerator interior to help you clearly see your food. So you can find items easier and don't have to keep the door open as long – saving both time and energy. The A+ energy efficiency rated RB31FDRNDSA/EU uses a digital inverter motor that is more durable and energy efficient than standard motors in fridge freezers. This means you can rely on your fridge freezer for excellent cooling for longer.The motor is also backed by a 10 year parts warranty, providing you with even more peace of mind._______________________________________PLEASE NOTE:Use in outbuildings: This refrigerator is not designed to be used in an outbuilding – both your food and the appliance can be damaged. Do not use it in any unheated area.Reversible door hinges: This appliance has a reversible door.

item.description: Top features:- Pyrolytic cleaning function for simpler maintenance- 3D Hotair Plus for even heat distribution- A-class energy efficiency rating helps to reduce household billsPyrolytic cleaningWith pyrolytic self-cleaning, the Bosch Serie 6 HBA73R150B Single Oven will heat up to an impressive 480°C, turning all grease and food residue into ash for easy cleaning.3D Hotair PlusEnjoy even heat distribution across all three cooking levels with 3D Hotair Plus. Hotair Eco can evenly heat a single shelf, preventing energy wastage - ideal when you're eating alone or just preparing smaller portions.A-class energy efficiency ratingReduce your environmental impact and your energy bills without compromising on cooking results – the Serie 6 HBA73R150B carriesan A energy efficiency rating to ensure cost-effective performance.

item.title: SAMSUNG RB37J5330SA/EU 70/30 Fridge Freezer - Silver
item.description: Product features201 x 59.5 x 71.9 cm (H x W x D)Fridge: 269 litres / Freezer: 98 litresNo need to defrost with frost free technologyFast chill rapidly lowers the temperature inside the fridgeOpen door & temperature alarms warn you if the temperature risesBring intelligent and stylish refrigeration into your kitchen with the Samsung RB37J5330SA/EU 70/30 Fridge Freezer. Samsung's Digital Invertor Compressor intelligently varies its power and running speed according to how much cooling is needed, meaning a reduction in both energy consumption and noise level. The compressor also comes with a ten year guarantee.All-round coolingEnsure your food stays as fresh as possible thanks to the RB37J5330SA's all-around cooling system that maintains even temperatures across the fridge and freezer.With clever storage compartments including a fresh zone and dedicated veg box, you can be sure your favourite foods are kept at their best.Digital Inverter CompressorOperating at six different speeds, the Digital Inverter Compressor maintains a consistent temperature and keeps running noise to a minimum by automatically controlling the speed response to the demands of the RB37J5330SA. It's also incredibly durable - reducing energy usage and everyday wear and tear for long-lasting performance.Frost FreeThanks to Samsung's No Frost technology you don't have to worry about ice build up. The RB37J5330SA/EU is frost free and maintains a constant temperature throughout. So you can say goodbye to defrosting the freezer and hello to easy refrigeration maintenance.Flexible storageNow you can store food the way that suits you, with four adjustable door bins that are ideal for differently sized items. Adjust the bins to fit bottles, cartons or boxes and maximise your storage space.The slide-in shelf moves in and out to create more space for bulkier items or bottles, so you never have wasted space.Featuring the slim-designed wall duct Space Max Technology, the RB37J5330SA provides more usable storage without compromising on performance or exterior dimensions.LED lightingFind all your favourites quickly and easily thanks to the fridge's bright, long-lasting LED lighting.Packed with useful storage features and a sleek silver finish, the Samsung RB37J5330SA 70/30 Fridge Freezermakes a smart addition to any modern kitchen.

item.title: SAMSUNG RB38R7737S9/EU 70/30 Fridge Freezer - Silver
item.description: Twin Cooling Plus keeps food freshThe Samsung RB38R7737S9/EU 70/30 Fridge Freezer‘s Twin Cooling Plus feature keeps your food fresh by making sure humidity is always at the perfect level in both the fridge and the freezer. It even stops flavours and smells from mixing so your food always tastes its best.There's plenty of space for everything too, with SpaceMax technology creating maximum storage space inside by making the walls slim but efficient.CoolSelect Plus Zone switches it upNeed some more freezing space? Or maybe you have too many items to squeeze into your fridge? item.title: LEISURE Cookmaster CK100F232K Dual Fuel Range Cooker - Black
item.description: Top features:&nbsp; - Gas hob and electric ovens provide flexible cooking options&nbsp; - Cooking with gas provides instant heat changes&nbsp; - Easy to keep clean thanks to catalytic liners&nbsp; Gas hob and electric ovens Ideal for the busy cook, this spacious range cooker has more than enough room to prepare your meals. Whether you cater for elaborate dinner parties or a demanding family, the combination of gas hob and electric ovens as well as a variable grill give you plenty of cooking options at meal times.&nbsp; The two oven cavities give you a combined capacity of 115 litres which make even the largest of dishes a breeze to prepare.&nbsp; Choose from conventional and fanned heat to use the&nbsp;Cookmaster&nbsp;for simultaneous baking and roasting, ideal for conscientious cooking.&nbsp; A separate electric grill compartment offers yet more cooking options, while a built in storage flap means all your vital cooking equipment stays neat, tidy and close to hand for when you need it. Cooking with gas Up top, the&nbsp;Cookmaster CK100F232K&nbsp;boasts an impressive seven gas burners, all with cast iron pan supports that provide durability and stabilty as you cook.&nbsp; A fast and responsive wok burner is fantastic for quick Asian style cuisine and like all the other burners is fitted with a flame supervision device for added peace of mind. Should any of the hobs go out, the supply of gas will automatically cut off – saving gas and preventing any potential dangerous situations. Easy to keep clean Helping keep your oven clean, both oven cavities make use of catalytic liners. Coated with micro-porous enamel, the liners absorb any splashes that occur during cooking. During high temperature cooking these are burnt off, so the cavities only require a quick wipe down when cool for a time and labour saving way to clean.

item.title: Amica ZWM696W 60cm Wide 12 Place Full Size Freestanding Dishwasher - White
item.description: Dimensions: 845mm(H) x 598mm(W) x 600mm(D)This&nbsp;Amica ZWM696W 12 Place Freestanding White Dishwasher is ideal for medium sized households, with 12 Place Settings and 6 Washing Programmes. With an A++ Energy Efficiency Rating, not only is this machine economical in reducing its impact on the environment, but it can also reduce your energy bills at it consumes less energy. Additionally this has an adjustable lower basket, half load option and 3/6/9/12 hour timer delay, so suit different lifestyles and dishwashing requirements. Also included is a 2 year manufacturers warranty to give you that extra peace of mind.Key Features: A++ Energy Efficiency Rating cutting your energy bills 12 Place Setting Capacity ideal for a medium sized household 6 Washing programmes Quiet dishwashing with a 49dB Noise Level Start Delay: 3/6/9/12 hours &amp; Half Load Option Adjustable lower basket 2 Years Warranty for extra peace of mind Dimensions: 845mm(H) x 598mm(W) x 600mm(D) Residual heat drying Electric salt and rinse aid indicators 3080 L &amp; 258 kWh average annual water &amp; energy consumption12 Place Setting Capacity More clean dishes in one dishwashing cycle. Now you can put in the dishwasher more sets of dishes.Energy Efficiency Rating A++ Modern design is not the only way to customer satisfaction. Technically advanced our dishwashers are available in energy class A++. Compared to class A dishwasher, the dishwasher energy savings in class A++ is 64 kWh, which translates to about 70 washing cycles per year for free, using the Eco 50 program.Electric Rinse Aid Indicator For the gentle treatment of your dishes and best washing performance in our dishwashers salt is dispensed automatically depending on the water hardness level. If there is not enough salt or rinse aid, the electronic controls will show that immediately.Electric Salt Indicator Concerned about the dishes and the washing efficency, our dishwashers dispense salt regeneration automatically adjusting its size to the hardness of the water. If salt or rinse aid is too little, electronic indicators immediately inform about that.Intensive Programme 60°C This programme is ideal for cleaning very dirty dishes such as saucepans when a regular programme is perhaps not enough. Pre-washing with hot water takes place before the main wash and rinsing with hot water takes place twice. The Intensive programme, using maximum temperature of the washing and increased dose of detergent, makes that even burnt fat disappears without a trace.Half Wash Load You no longer need to wait to start the cycle until the dishwasher is full. Just load one basket or both (with half the dishes). Then all spray arms will operate alternately (sequential mode). The cycle guarantees time and money savings.Adjustable Lower Basket Thanks to the possibility of folding the plate racks in any given basket, its surface area can be increased to fit bowls, pans and even trays. Now it is easy to wash any pan or other large vessel.4 Upper Rack Shelves Organize the space as you like. The system allows vertical adjustment of the upper shelf, making the use of the product more comfortable.Concealed Heating Element The flow-through water heater is a great advantage of our dishwashers as it guarantees energy savings. The heater is located underneath the washing chamber to increase the dishwasher capacity, improve its interior and make the product cleaning easier.

item.title: BOSCH SMV40C00GB Full-size Integrated Dishwasher
item.description: What stands outFully integrated design gives you a sleek and uniform look in your kitchenWith an A+ energy rating and LoadSensor technology you&rsquo;ll keep the bills downDosageAssist ensures your detergent is spread evenly across every item to give you the best resultsInfoLight projects a red light onto your kitchen floor so you&rsquo;ll know when your cycle has finishedIt&rsquo;s really quiet at 54dB &ndash; that&rsquo;s about as loud as your fridge freezer12 place setting capacity and height adjustable top basket makes it perfect for a smaller sized family homeThe detailsThe perfect appliance for any home, the Bosch ActiveWater Dishwasher combines a number of features to deliver convenient, energy efficient and high quality washing results. Taking care of your delicate items such as glass and porcelain, while also using elbow grease to remove stains from tough cookware, this dishwasher will have your pots sparkling.With four wash programmes to choose from, you can select the one that suits your load so you can be sure you&rsquo;ll get the best results. Normal 65&deg;C, Economy 50&deg;C, Quick wash 45&deg;C and Pre-rinse functions each offer different benefits to suit every item. AquaMix glass protection technology constantly regulates the hardness of your water, ensuring valuable and delicate items do not suffer from corrosion with each wash. The VarioSpeed special option cleans in up to half of the time, which is perfect for when you&rsquo;re in a rush!ActiveWater technology makes sure you don&rsquo;t waste water or energy, re-using water from the pre-rinse if it is clean enough to do so. In addition to this, LoadSensor technology senses the size of your load in order to provide the perfect amount of water. DosageAssist technology ensures your detergent is fully dissolved and evenly spread across your load, giving everything the wash it deserves!AquaStop technology gives you peace of mind, knowing your dishwasher will not flood or cause water damage through leaking. A double-walled hose, a safety valve and floor sump with float switch are all provided to give you protection against water damage.This dishwasher holds around 120 items for a single cycle; that&rsquo;s 12 place settings, which makes it perfect for a smaller family home. With a height adjustable upper basket, you&rsquo;ll easily fit those awkwardly shaped and bulky items in to be washed. When a cycle is in progress, a red LED projects onto the floor so you can quickly glance to see when it is complete. item.description: Product features 192 x 79.5 x 74.5 cm (H x W x D) Fridge: 336 litres / Freezer: 150 litres Total frost free Convertible fridge &amp; freezer zone for extra storage Food freshness feature to keep your fruit and veg freshMulti-door, flexible storage The Samsung&nbsp;RF50K5960S8/EU Fridge Freezer's wide-opening multi-door design means you've got more storage and easy to access to all your tasty food and drink. Triple cooling keeps your food fresh Your food always stays fresh in the Samsung&nbsp;RF50K5960S8/EU. Triple cooling has, as the name suggests, three separate flows of air moving around the fridge and freezer. This way humidity levels are always at the best levels for looking after your fruit and veg. With three separate air flows and precise temperature control,&nbsp;the fridge, freezer and the convertible zone are maintained at an optimal humidity level, so your food stays fresher for longer. CoolSelect Plus Zone switches it up Stocking up on extra ice cream? Or maybe you need extra fridge space for the weekend's dinner party? The CoolSelect Plus Zone can be turned into a fridge or a freezer at the press of a button, so you can adjust the temperature as you need to. Frost free, fuss free Forget about defrosting with the&nbsp;RF50K5960S8/EU. Its Total No Frost feature means it will never build up ice, so it's really easy to look after. item.title: Hoover DXC10DG 10kg Smart Condenser Tumble Dryer - WH
item.description: The Hoover Dynamic Next DXC10DG Smart Condenser Smart Tumble Dryer offers an impressive 10kg load capacity aswell as many handy functions to make light work of your laundry piles. One impressive feature is the ability to be able to control your new tumble dryer via your smartphone. The DXC10DG features Sensor Drying technology which means you have the ability to set the dryness level you require and once that level has been achieved the tumble dryer will turn itself off. This allows you to keep your clothes in a much better condition as you will never over dry your clothes, it also saves you money on your energy bills. You have the choice of Iron Dry, Store Dry and Hang Dry. Thanks to the One Touch Control your new tumble dryer works as simply as a contactless payment system, using your compatible smartphone you are able to control, monitor and manage your appliance via the Hoover Wizard app. You can control things like energy monitoring, machine check-up, clever end delay and much more. As this tumble dryer is a condenser dryer it doesn't require an external wall vent to get rid of steam. This means you have that little extra freedom when it comes to placing your new tumble dryer. The condensed water is collected in a container ready for you to empty when the indicator lets you know the reservoir is full.

It's a simple matter to wipe or sweep away any residue to maintain a beautifully clean interior. Coupled with EasyClean technology, this takes all the hassle out of keeping the oven clean. Cook well with the Neff N70 B57CR22N0B Slide&amp;Hide Electric Oven.

item.title: CDA VM550SS 17L 700W Slim Depth Built-in Standard Microwave Stainless Steel
item.description: What stands out 17L capacity gives you plenty of space and easily fits an average-size plate Built-in design creates a neat, uniform look and frees up your worktop space Doesn't require the same amount of space as other built-in appliances, giving you more freedom when installing The stainless steel and black finish looks great in any kitchen setting 5 power levels for you to cook your meal at the correct temperature 8 auto programmes that help take the guesswork out of your cooking OVERALL DIMENSIONS: H38.2 x W59.5 x D32 cm The details This simple to use 17L built-in microwave is great for preparing your favourite meals without taking up too much space in your kitchen. It features an easy-to-use dial and button controls for you to quickly select the function you want. There are five different power levels to choose from, up to a maximum of 700 Watts, which means you won't have to wait long for your food to cook regardless of what it is. So, whether you're just looking to soften some ice cream, heat a bowl of rice or boil a cup of water, you'll find a power level that's right for you. It also offers a range of eight auto-cooking programmes to give you tailored cooking results for things like meat, fish, potatoes and even pizza, so you don't have to worry about over-cooking your meals. Plus, it also has the ability to defrost by time or weight, which means you can take your food straight out the freezer and have it defrosted, ready to cook in minutes. The microwave’s built-in design sits within your kitchen unit at eye level, which makes it easy for you to access and frees up your work top area to keep your other everyday kitchen essentials. This model in particular features a shallower depth to other traditional built-in appliances, which means you'll have added flexibility over your kitchen design when it comes to installing it. We suggest you double check the measurements of your unit beforehand to make sure it's perfectly sized to fit. The full cut-out dimensions of the microwave can be found with the images above, but if you're still a little unsure about sizes, then just get in touch and we'll try our best to help! Essential info 20L capacity 700W Max power Built in design 5 power levels 8 auto programmes: Veg, fish, meat, pasta, potato, pizza, popcorn and drinks Defrost setting Rotary Knob &amp; Buttons 24.5 cm Glass turntable Left hinged door Overall dimensions: H38.2 x W59.5 x D32 cm Stainless steel and black finish 1 year warranty &nbsp;

item.title: HOOVER WDXOC 485A 8 kg Washer Dryer - White - WH
item.description: Product features Wash load capacity: 8 kg Drying load capacity: 5 kg Spin speed: 1400 rpm Energy rating: ADownload new programs With the Hoover&nbsp;WDXOC 485A Smart 8 kg Washer&nbsp;Dryer,&nbsp;you can take complete control of your laundry -&nbsp;the One Touch NFC feature makes it simple check up on your laundry directly from your smartphone. Simply download the Hoover Wizard app to your Android device and you'll be able to download new cycles, as well as checking up on your machine's performance. It works in the same way as contactless payments. All you have to do is hover your smartphone above the machine to connect the devices together and manage your machine's settings. Smart sensors With Sensor Dry, you can take the guesswork out of drying your clothes. Choose from Extra Dry, Cupboard Dry or Iron Dry, and the&nbsp;WDXOC 485A&nbsp;switches itself off automatically as soon as your desired level of dryness has been reached. The result? Your clothes are dried exactly how you like them, and you'll save both on time and energy. An energy-saving KG mode uses an intelligent sensor to weigh your laundry at the start of the cycle. The appliance then adjusts the cycle time, water amount, and electricity consumption to suit each individual load for an efficient performance every time. Easier loading An extra-large porthole makes it easier to load and empty the machine - ideal when you're tired after a long day, or in a rush.

item.title: Hotpoint Class 5 DKU5 541 J C IX Built-under Electric Oven - Black
item.description: Giving you more space for culinary excellence, the Hotpoint Built-under Double Oven provides exceptional space, essential functions and brilliant self-cleaning technology. The main oven provides 59L of capacity and offers three choices of automatic function including; Multi-level, Slow Cook and Defrost. With the top oven, choose between traditional heat or grill. Using Circulaire Fan, reduce cooking time by 20% through a clever combination of fan and rear element heat production to ensure even cooking between the shelves. A great function if you love to batch bake or create delicious pastries. When it comes to cleaning, this model features Catalytic Liners - a self-cleaning system that requires no chemicals as special panels against the oven wall catch food and fat spits, evaporating them during the cooking process. Operate the Hotpoint Built-under oven through the super stylish Push Push Controls which sit flush again the unit when not in use, and enjoy the flawless line with cooking versatility. Hotpoint &amp; Jamie Oliver partnership Pairing the very best of Jamie Oliver s home-cooking philosophy with Hotpoint s everyday, innovative products, our partnership is designed to help us all take care of the people we love through the joy of food. We believe our shared vision of eating well and developing easy-to-use appliances can shape the health and wellbeing of everyone. Jamie Oliver: I'm so excited to be working with Hotpoint and show how their incredible equipment can make your life easier in the kitchen, so you can cook up a storm for your nearest and dearest, every day of the week. This is an Extra Choice product. Please see the Extra Choice information within customer services for more details. Push Push Controls - Enjoy a flush, easy-to-clean aesthetic with push dials. Push once to extend the dial, setting program and temperature, push again to restore the sleek line of your oven’s fascia. Catalytic Stay Clean Liners - Catalytic Liners absorb all the grease, dirt and residue from your oven, then uses a heat of around 200c to burn it off and restore the clean. Circulaire Fan Cooking - Reduce cooking time by 20% through a clever combination of fan and rear heat circling between shelves. Even results whilst saving 10-20°c compared to conventional oven cooking.

item.title: Hotpoint Class 7 MP 776 IX H-HL Built-in Microwave - Stainless Steel
item.description: Eye-catching and packed with intuitive options for your cooking exploits, the Hotpoint Built-In Microwave MP 776 1HX combines 40L cooking capacity with 900W of power and 5 automatic programs.Featuring Multiwave Technology for an absolutely even cooking experience, this system uses two entry points for the microwaves to meet your food, uniformly filling the cavity to ensure every aspect of your dish is thoroughly heated or defrosted.Combining aspects of a microwave, oven and grill, create a variety of meat, fish and veg dishes all to mouth-watering high standards. For fans of crispy-based pizzas, tarts and quiches, the Dynamic Crisp function with dedicated crisp plate ensures flaky pastry, snap-crunch bases with succulent toppings and fillings.Or, for a virtuous approach to mealtime, this model also comes with an integrated Steam function which boils the water immediately and keeps it on a roll to deliver healthy, flavoursome meals in super-quick time.A sleek design complemented by an easy-to-use Touch Control Interface makes the Hotpoint Built-In Microwave a pleasure to cook with and an attractive addition which integrates easily into every decor.

item.title: Whirlpool AMW834IXL-HL Built-In Microwave - Stainless Steel
item.description: The Whirlpool AMW 834/IXL Fusion Built-In Microwave in Stainless Steel has 900w power and 40L capacity. With 7 different power levels to offer you precision control to achieve perfect results every time. The microwave also comes with an iXelium coating that maintains the original shine for longer making it highly resistant to scratches and much easier to clean.&nbsp;Our unique patented 3D wave system combines dual heat emission with the reflection of microwaves creating a tridimensional distribution throughout the cavity. &nbsp;As a result food is heated quickly and evenly offering better results over a standard microwave. 6th sense technology detects the level of humidity in your food adapting the power and cooking time. The humidity sensor feeds information to the microprocessor which continuously readjusts the power and time to achieve the best results. The crisp function is the combination of 3 components: a special Crisp plate made with ferrite bottom, the 3D microwave distribution system and the grill. The Crisp plate is heated up extremely quickly by microwaves coming from the lower part of the cavity. The grill heats up the upper part of the dish, while microwaves from the top of the cavity speed up the cooking process. As the crisp plate does not heat up above 210&deg;C, food is prevented from being overcooked offering crunchy delicious food, thanks to the unique crisp plate accessory.

item.title: HOTPOINT RD 966 JGD UK-HL Washer Dryer - Graphite (2)
item.description: Product features Wash load capacity: 9 kg Drying load capacity: 6 kg Spin speed: 1600 rpm Energy rating: A One-year manufacturer’s guaranteeTop features:- Ensure an intensive and deep wash with direct injection, even at low temperatures- Sensor drying ensures your clothes are taken good care of- Provide extra gentle and anti-allergy care for delicate items such as baby clothing- Steam and crease care help remove germs and creases in your clothesEnsure an intensive and deep washEnjoy great cleaning results even at lower temperatures with direct injection technology, which premixes your detergent with water before it reaches your clothes for a greater distribution of soap.This allows the Hotpoint RD966JD Washer Dryer to remove over 100 stains even at low temperatures like 20° which saves you money on your energy bills.Sensor dryingIn-built sensor technology in the RD996JD monitors levels such as moisture and temperature inside the drum, using this information the dryer ensures your clothes are not over-heated or over-dried.This leaves you free to carry on with your day safe in the knowledge your clothes are being taken care of and you aren't wasting energy drying clothes which don't need it.Provide extra gentle and anti-allergy careNeutralise and remove up to 99.99% of major allergens, including dust mites and pollen, with the anti-allergy program – which was awarded the Allergy UK Seal of Approval.You can also gently care for your delicate woollen items when you use the Woolmark Platinum Care wash, which uses gentle drum movements and low spin speeds to prevent shrinkage and fabric damage.Steam careEnsure deep cleaning for regularly worn items such as your gym wear when you use steam technology, which adds an extra period of steam at the end of your wash cycle to remove any remaining germs and bacteria.There's no need to worry about unsightly creased clothing if you aren't on-hand to empty the RD996JD at the end of a cycle. The Creasecare options tumble the load without heat to prevent them sitting scrunched up.

item.title: Hotpoint HS1801AA-HL Integrated In-Column Fridge - White (2)
item.description: PRODUCT INFORMATIONOffering practical storage solutions for your food, Hotpoint&rsquo;s Day 1 HS1801AA Fridge is not only stylish, but built with excellent cooling storage in mind. Boasting 318L of capacity across five storage shelves there&rsquo;s ample room for all your fresh ingredients and produce. At 70cm depth, this fridge sits perfectly flush alongside your worktop for a seamless look. Including a Food Care zone, the coolest place in your fridge, ideal for preserving your meat and fish. Interior ventilation provides better conditions to preserve your food by ensuring a constant temperature and humidity. With an A+ energy rating, the Hotpoint Day 1 HS1801AA Fridge also comes with adjustable thermostat to ensure you enjoy maximum efficiency with exceptional preservation of your favourite foods. Whether your fridge is full of fish, meat, fruit or veggies, Hotpoint's fridge-freezers with Day 1 technologies create the right environment for your food, keeping it fresher for longer.Key Features&bull; Total Fridge Capacity: 303 Litres&bull; Food Care Zone&bull; Interior Ventilation&bull; Perfect Alignment&bull; A+ Energy rated&bull; Adjustable thermostat&bull; 5 Glass shelves&bull; Twin full width salad drawers&bull; Wine Rack&bull; Reversible door&bull; Number of fridge shelves: 5&bull; Door Storage&bull; Auto Defrost Refrigerator&bull; LED Indicators&bull; Low Noise Level&bull; Manufacturer Warranty: 1 Year&bull; Dimensions (HxWxD): 178cm x 54cm x 54.5cm

item.title: LG FWJ685WS NFC 8 kg Washer Dryer - White
item.description: Product features Wash capacity: 8 kg / Drying capacity: 5 kg Spin speed: 1400 rpm Energy rating: A Manage your laundry using your phone Stain removal to make sure your clothes always look their bestOur experts have some serious techsperience, and they think you'll love this LG&nbsp;FWJ685WS NFC 8 kg Washer Dryer.&nbsp;If you can't hear yourself think when your washing machine hits the spin cycle, this quiet LG washing machine is the answer. A wash that's kind to your clothes Want clothes that are soft and cared for? The LG&nbsp;FWJ685WS NFC 8 kg Washer Dryer&nbsp;uses steam technology to sanitise your laundry - ideal for both allergy sufferers and those with young children. LG's patented 6 Motion Direct Drive technology moves the drum in multiple ways to best suit the material of what you're washing. You'll get a perfect, gentle wash for everything from denim to woollens. With fewer moving parts, the appliance&nbsp;also makes less vibration, which means it's quieter, more reliable and more energy efficient - it's a win all round. Start a wash from your phone When you're cleaning a garment that needs extra care, the LG Smart ThinQ app makes laundry day easier. Just download the app on your phone and connect with NFC to&nbsp;unlock a whole host of new features. All you need to do is tap your phone against the machine to&nbsp;download new cycles. Nothing forgotten with Pause &amp; Add If you've dropped a sock on the way to the machine, there's no need to wait for the next load of laundry. With Pause &amp; Add, you can pause the wash at any time and add those extra dropped or forgotten bits.

item.title: SAMSUNG DV90M50003X/EU 9 kg Heat Pump Tumble Dryer - Graphite
item.description: Product features Capacity: 9 kg Energy rating: A++ Sensor dryingTop features: - Dry your clothes more efficiently with heat pump technology - Sensors adjust drying time automatically to protect your clothes - Adjustable drying levels to suit your preference - Quick dry small loads in just 35 minutes - Diagonose faults in seconds with the Samsung Smart Home app Dry your clothes more efficiently Dry your clothes and use less energy with the Samsung&nbsp;DV90M50003X/EU 9 kg Heat Pump Tumble Dryer.&nbsp;It uses heat pump technology – a more cost-effective way of drying clothes by using hot air to absorb moisture from your clothes. By using a lower temperature than conventional dryers to dry your garments, it offers them better protection. This means your clothes will look newer for longer. Sensors adjust drying time automatically Another way the dryer protects your clothes is by using automatic sensors. These adjust the temperature and drying time for the best result, all while helping to lower your energy consumption. Adjustable drying levels Choose from three drying levels. Have your clothes perfectly dry ready to wear straightaway, or slightly humid to make ironing easier. Quick dry small loads Dry your clothes in less time with the Quick Dry 35 programme. It can dry a small 1 kg load of clothes in just 35 minutes. Diagonse faults in seconds This machine features Samsung Smart Check, which lets you instantly diagnose issues using the Samsung Smart Home app for Android or iOS handsets. Once Smart Check is activated, simply run the smartphone app and focus its camera on the Smart Check code on the machine. Your phone will recognise the code, and provide detailed information on the status of your appliance and how to solve any problem. It saves you the hassle and cost of calling out an engineer.

item.title: Montpellier INT61T99-13A 59cm Induction Hob With Cable and 3 pin UK Plug - Black
item.description: Montpellier's INT61T99-13A 60cm induction hob is the perfect edition to your kitchen if your looking for a 4 zone hob with a stylish design and heats the contents of your pan up quickly. The induction technology means the pan* is heated directly rather than wasting energy heating the cooking surface, this is how it is able to heat up quicker than a ceramic hob would. There is also little residual heat from the cooking surface which means spills can be quickly wiped up soon after cooking. This hob also benefits from being supplied with a 13Amp plug already attached. *Pan must have a high iron content due to induction working on magnetism.)Key Features 4 Cooking zones Uses induction technology so it heats faster and is inherently safer Touch controls at the front Hot hob indicator to let you know if hob surface has gotten too warm to touch 13 Amp plug fitted 99 minute timer to help you look after the dishes you're cooking Control panel lock to prevent accidentally changing the settings

item.description: Experience the ultimate in hob technology with the Whirlpool Smartcook SMP778C/NE/IXL Induction Hob. The 770cm wide, flexifull surface provides amazing cooking flexibility and caters for all pans of varying shapes and sizes as you can cook anywhere within the 8 induction zones. Cooking on induction is fast and energy efficient. This Whirlpool induction hob features revolutionary 6th Sense Technology; intelligent sensors will automatically set the ideal temperature and power for simmering, melting or boiling at the touch of a button. There are no protruding controls on this model as it is operated with touch controls which are built into the glass surface and are intuitive and a delight to use. The completely flat, glass surface is coated with iXelium treatment making the surface highly resistant to scratches, keeping the Whirlpool Smartcook Hob in immaculate condition for longer. Hob features; FlexiFull, 6th sense technology, Chef control, Assisted Display, iXelium coating, Front controls Hob funtions; Induction technology, Melting function, Flexible cooking, Moka function, Fry, Grill

This also has the added benefit of preserving the available storage space, so you can store more of your frozen favourites.Water and ice dispenserGet deliciously cold water at any time of the year. The&nbsp;RF702N4IS1 Fridge Freezer&nbsp;features a plumbed water dispenser, giving you consistently chilled&nbsp;water on tap. Because it&#39;s plumbed, there&#39;s no water tank to manually fill and wait to cool, so you can get that perfectly cool hydration as soon as you get home.You can also choose to dispense fresh cubed ice, ready to crush for cocktails or to chill your drink to perfection.Fresh drawer with humidity controlWhen the recipe only requires half an onion, don&#39;t let the other half go to waste. With the Hisense&nbsp;RF702N4IS1&#39;s fresh food drawer, you&#39;re able to fully control the humidity to keep your perishable groceries tasting vibrant and fresh. It slows down the process of food spoiling, so you can enjoy your&nbsp;fruit and veg for longer.Touch controlsThe whole family can get to grips with the controls of the&nbsp;RF702N4IS1 Fridge Freezer. Its touch controls are easily visible on the outside, and effortlessly control temperature as well as the holiday and super cooling modes -&nbsp;ideal when you&#39;ve just returned from the supermarket and you need to rapidly cool the new items.

item.title: BEKO Pro GNE60520DX 70/30 Fridge Freezer - Stainless Steel - GRADE A UNBOXED
item.description: Product features 182.5 x 84 x 74.5 cm (H x W x D) Fridge: 387 litres / Freezer: 152 litres No need to defrost with frost free technology Water &amp; ice dispenser (requires plumbing) Food freshness feature to keep your fruit and veg freshTop features:&nbsp;- Generous storage space for big shopping trips- Intuitive cooling with NeoFrost technology- Active Fresh blue lights helps maintain your fruit and vegetables- Hygiene features to prevent the formation of bacteriaGenerous storageWith a gross capacity just over 600 litres, you&#39;ll never have to worry about finding space after big shopping trips again. The Beko&nbsp;GNE60520DX American-Style 70/30 Fridge Freezer&nbsp;has a clever design that features side-by-side fridge doors on top and two medium sized freezer drawers underneath &ndash; for more efficient storage.Intuitive coolingThe&nbsp;GNE60520DX&nbsp;is equipped with NeoFrost technology, which helps maintain the optimal humidity across the fridge and freezer. Two separate fans and evaporators keep food fresh and ensure there&#39;s no transfer of odours between the fridge and freezer drawers.Active FreshInnovative blue LED lights help maintain the vitamin content in your fruit and veg &ndash; so you can enjoy less waste and save money on your weekly shop.The&nbsp;GNE60520X&#39;s dedicated chiller compartment is also perfect for storing fresh meat and fish for longer - by maintaining a low temperature at around 0&deg;C.Hygiene featuresThanks to its antibacterial door seals, the&nbsp;GNE60520DX&nbsp;prevents bacteria from forming and entering the fridge &ndash; perfect for keeping food fresh.The integrated odour filter also stops bad smells from taking over or spreading to other foods.

item.title: BOSCH Serie 4 KGE49VI4AG 60/40 Fridge Freezer - GRADE A UNBOXED
item.description: Product features 201 x 70 x 65 cm (H x W x D) Fridge: 302 litres / Freezer: 111 litres Easy defrosting with low frost technology Food freshness feature to keep your fruit and veg fresh Fast freeze rapidly lowers the temperature inside the freezerTop features: - Keep fresh foods at their best for longer with the VitaFresh drawers&nbsp;- Freeze fast and preserve the quality of your frozen goods&nbsp;- BigBox frozen drawer helps you make the most of your storage space&nbsp;Keep fresh foods at their bestNever throw away food before the use-by-date again with the Bosch&nbsp;Serie 4 KGE49VI4AG 60/40 Fridge Freezer.The&nbsp;Serie 4 KGE49VI4AG&nbsp;features two VitaFresh 0 Degree compartments in the fridge section which can be adjusted between 0, 2 or 4&deg;C. This makes them ideal for keeping meat, fish and vegetables fresher for longer, so you won&#39;t have to hurry to use them up quickly.As you can leave any extra bits of meat to use in another meal with confidence that they&#39;ll keep their quality, it will also help you to cut your food wastage.Freeze fastIf your freezer takes ages to get your food shop properly frozen, your goods can lose some of their structure and quality in the meantime. Perfect for getting small food loads frozen quickly, the Freeze Fast function will make sure your foods get down to temperature quickly.BigBox frozen drawerIt can sometimes be difficult to fit awkwardly shaped items like pizza boxes into your freezer. The BixBox frozen food drawer is ideal for these larger packages, and is perfect for stacking storage containers so you can make the most of your freezer space.With clear drawer fronts, it&#39;s also easy to see what you&#39;ve got in, so you won&#39;t need to waste time rummaging around looking for the ice creams on a hot day, letting all the cold air out of the freezer. ___________________________________________________________________________PLEASE NOTE:Use in outbuildings:&nbsp;This refrigerator is not designed to be used in an outbuilding &ndash; both your food and the appliance can be damaged. Do not use it in any unheated area
